data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Saitama, Japan to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saitama, Japan

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Saitama, Japan be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Saitama, Japan to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 40,714 believers in Saitama that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Amami-Oshima, Southern people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Saitama hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Saitama, Japan so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Saitama, Japan.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight
